evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Susan Webber is an enrolled member of the Blackfeet Nation and an elected representative of the Blackfeet and Confederated Salish and Kootenai Nations of Montana.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Susan Webber is an enrolled member of the Blackfeet Nation and an elected representative of the Blackfeet and Confederated Salish and Kootenai Nations of Montana.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Jonathan St. Goddard is a rancher on the Blackfeet Nation who operates the family ranch south of Browning. St. Goddard is an enrolled member of the Blackfeet Tribe, with relatives in Canada who are enrolled tribal members.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Jonathan St. Goddard is a rancher on the Blackfeet Nation who operates the family ranch south of Browning; he is an enrolled member of the Blackfeet Tribe and a representative of the Confederated Salish and Kootenai Nations.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant Kristi Noem is the Secretary of the United States Department of Homeland Security and that agency’s highest ranking official.

extracted.value: Defendant: Kristi Noem is the Secretary of the United States Department of Homeland Security and that agency’s highest ranking official.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant the United States Department of Homeland Security is a cabinet agency within the executive branch of the United States government that has been created by Congress.

extracted.value: Defendant: United States Department of Homeland Security is a cabinet agency within the executive branch of the United States government that has been created by Congress.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant the United States of America is responsible for the exercise of executive action by the named Defendants and all other agencies that are directed by the Order to take action respecting the imposition of universal tariffs.

extracted.value: Defendant: United States of America is responsible for the exercise of executive action by the named Defendants and all other agencies that are directed by the Order to take action respecting the imposition of universal tariffs.
